titles.title: Disaster Burden Relief Act of 1999
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide disaster relief for homeowners.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 6/30/1999--Introduced. Disaster Burden Relief Act of 1999 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to set forth special rules for homes which were destroyed as a result of a disaster in a Presidentially declared disaster area, including permitting a tax credit for certain mortgage payments.
